Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  üåü How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. rewards.description: üåë Return of Reckoning ‚Äì Twilight Tide 2025 Drops | July 25 to August 4 üåë  The dreaded time of year has come once again, when Sariour na Yenlui thins the veil between the Realm of Chaos and the known world. Morrslieb looms closest in the sky, heralding a season of dread as daemonic legions pour forth in relentless tides.  Archmages strengthen ancient wards while Asur hosts gather to repel the onslaught. Only the superior craft of Ulthuan‚Äôs defenders can hold back the horrors clawing at reality itself. Meanwhile, the cunning Druchii stand ready to strike at their distracted kin, eager to turn chaos to their own advantage.  From 10:00 AM UTC on July 25 to 10:00 AM UTC on August 4, join the Twilight Tide celebration on Twitch. Watch six total hours of Return of Reckoning across any Drops-enabled stream to earn up to seven exclusive rewards, honoring your unyielding spirit in the face of Chaos.  Whether you fight for duty, vengeance, or the thrill of battle itself, this struggle is yours.  Watch. Defend. Conquer
rewards.name: Twilight Tide 2025
